headline: The Bull Case For CME Group (CME) Could Change Following High-Profile Globex Outage On Expiry Day
summary: CME Group recently experienced technical outages on its Globex platform that halted trading in key metals and natural gas futures and options on a major contract expiry day, forcing the cancellation of several order types and disrupting clients’ ability to roll positions. These disruptions have sharpened investor focus on CME Group’s technology resilience and operational reliability just as the company is handling record open interest in U.S. Treasury contracts and expanding 24/7 crypto...
